channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Hyatt to buy growing lifestyle hotel giant Standard International for as much as $335 million
item.description: The luxury and lifestyle hotel sector continues to be the bread and butter for Hyatt. On Tuesday, the Chicago-based hotel giant announced plans to acq...

item.title: Park Hyatt plans to open its fourth hotel in Japan — but don’t rush to book your trip
item.description: A fourth Park Hyatt hotel is coming to Japan. However, you’ll have to wait a few years to check in. Park Hyatt Sapporo will debut in Hokkaido Prefectu...

item.title: How long do Chase Ultimate Rewards points take to transfer to partner programs?

item.title: JetBlue offering new status match to Alaska, American, Delta and United elites

item.title: 5 reasons I love the Chase Freedom Unlimited as a credit card beginner
